description:
Tactile Soft-Body Physics Gameplay
Your car is made of Jelly. So is the world! Utilize this and your various abilities (Grow, Balloon, Sticky Tires, Rocket, and more) to navigate the levels and find the exit!

Imaginative and Playful Design
Journey through 8 worlds, each with its own theme and gameplay mechanics. Every level has a secret exit to find, as well as multiple optional challenges. 

So much Customization
Draw your own car designs with an in-game paint tool.

Make Your Own Levels
A fully-featured level editor is included to make your own squishy playgrounds.

Classic Levels Return
Classic levels from earlier games in the JellyCar series have been restored and included!

A Living Flipbook
The sounds and visuals combine to give the experience of a flipbook animation come to life.

I Remember This Game From My Childhood!
Yay!  After more than 10 years since the last entry in the series, the original creator (Walaber) is back and developing this all-new, modern rendition of the classic JellyCar gameplay.
name: JellyCar Worlds
intro: It's a Car, made of Jelly! Squishy Physics, Tactile, Silly & Imaginative Driving/Platforming
